pr_title: [BEAM-9726] Make region optional for non-service runner.

[BEAM-9726] [java] Make region optional for non-service runner.

timeline.bodyText: Is this always true? (I do not know the answer but probably good to check wrt staging etc. endpoints.)
timeline.author: aaltay

replies.bodyText:
I copied this from the Python SDK, so I'm not sure what the source of truth is. But a quick code search doesn't return any obvious negatives.

  
    
      beam/sdks/python/apache_beam/options/pipeline_options_validator.py
    
    
         Line 106
      in
      ac003b6
    
    
    
    

        
          
           ENDPOINT_PATTERN = r'https://[\S]*googleapis\.com[/]?'
replies.author: ibzib
